name: Overall Performance
query: SELECT id, ROUND(score * 100, 1) AS "Score (%)", ROUND(accuracy * 100, 1) AS "Accuracy (%)", tasks_evaluated AS "Tasks", tasks_successful AS "Passed" FROM (SELECT participant_id AS id, score, accuracy, tasks_evaluated, tasks_successful, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY participant_id ORDER BY score DESC, timestamp DESC) AS rn FROM (SELECT json_keys(results.participants)[1] AS participant_id, CAST(results.participants[json_keys(results.participants)[1]].score AS DOUBLE) AS score, CAST(results.participants[json_keys(results.participants)[1]].accuracy AS DOUBLE) AS accuracy, CAST(results.participants[json_keys(results.participants)[1]].tasks_evaluated AS INTEGER) AS tasks_evaluated, CAST(results.participants[json_keys(results.participants)[1]].tasks_successful AS INTEGER) AS tasks_successful, results.timestamp FROM results)) WHERE rn = 1 ORDER BY score DESC;

name: By Dataset
query: SELECT id, ROUND(bizfinbench * 100, 1) AS "BizFinBench (%)", ROUND(public_csv * 100, 1) AS "CSV (%)", ROUND(options * 100, 1) AS "Options (%)" FROM (SELECT participant_id AS id, bizfinbench, public_csv, options, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY participant_id ORDER BY score DESC) AS rn FROM (SELECT json_keys(results.participants)[1] AS participant_id, CAST(results.participants[json_keys(results.participants)[1]].score AS DOUBLE) AS score, CAST(results.participants[json_keys(results.participants)[1]].dataset_scores.bizfinbench.mean_score AS DOUBLE) AS bizfinbench, CAST(results.participants[json_keys(results.participants)[1]].dataset_scores.public_csv.mean_score AS DOUBLE) AS public_csv, CAST(results.participants[json_keys(results.participants)[1]].dataset_scores.options.mean_score AS DOUBLE) AS options FROM results)) WHERE rn = 1 ORDER BY id;
